Strengthening VA Whistleblower Protection Act of 2020
To amend title 38, United States Code, to make certain improvements in the laws relating to whistleblower protection at the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Strengthening VA Whistleblower Protection Act of 2020
This bill modifies provisions relating to whistleblower protection at the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA), including by requiring the General Counsel of the VA to establish an independent Office of General Counsel for the Office of Accountability and Whistleblower Protection.
